means: （乳房等多细胞腺体）顶浆分泌的，顶泌的

word_mean: 顶〔浆分〕泌的，泌离的：腺体分泌的一种型式，其分泌产物聚积在分泌细胞的游离端或顶端部分，然后与顶部细胞质一同脱下而分泌

sentence.Network_en: The apocrine glands are to be found chiefly in the armpits and in the pubic regions.
sentence.Network_cn: 顶浆分泌腺主要可在腋窝和会阴部找到.

sentence.Network_en: Results Apocrine carcinoma of the breast had special pathological changes.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from apo- + Greek krinein 'to separate'

means.word_mean: 1. (of exocrine glands) producing a secretion in which part of the secreting cell is released with the secretion;
